forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
